short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create calendar events from selected text. Generates ICS files compatible with all major calendar applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that helps you create calendar events from selected text.

## Features
- Create calendar events from selected text
- Supports multiple date/time formats
- Generates ICS files compatible with all major calendar applications
- Works offline
- Supports multiple events at once

## How to Use
1. Select text containing event details
2. Right-click and select "Download Calendar Events"
3. Open the downloaded ICS file with your preferred calendar application

## Supported Formats
1. "Event Name Month DD YYYY HH:MM AM/PM - HH:MM AM/PM"
   Example: "Team Meeting November 21 2024 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM"

2. "part X: Day DD Month YYYY HH:MMam/pm - HH:MMam/pm"
   Example: "part 1: Tue 12 November 2024 7:00pm - 9:30pm"

## Privacy
This extension does not collect any personal data. All processing happens locally on your device.
